channel.title: Posts on IVP | Peking University
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on IVP | Peking University
channel.copyright: © Immersive Video Perception Group, Peking University, 2020

item.title: New Editorship
item.description: Dr. Wei Gao has been appointed as Associate Editor for Neural Processing Letters (NEPL, CCF recommended journal).

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: One paper has been accepted to IEEE Transactions on Circuits and Systems for Video Technology (TCSVT). View the detail: Unified Information Fusion Network for Multi-Modal RGB-D and RGB-T Salient Object Detection

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: One paper has been accepted to IEEE Transactions on Multimedia (TMM). View the detail: Cross-modality Fusion and Progressive Integration Network for Saliency Prediction on Stereoscopic 3D Images

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: One paper has been accepted to IEEE Transactions on Industrial Informatics (TII). View the detail: Consistent Quality Oriented Rate Control in HEVC via Balancing Intra and Inter Frame Coding

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: One paper has been accepted to IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition Workshops (CVPRW) 2021. View the detail: Deep Image Compression with Latent Optimization and Piece-wise Quantization Approximation

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: One paper has been accepted to ACM Transactions on Multimedia Computing Communications and Applications (TOMM). View the detail: A Fast View Synthesis Implementation Method for Light Field Applications

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: Two papers have been accepted to IEEE International Conference on Multimedia and Expo (ICME) 2021. View the detail: Dynamic Computational Resource Allocation for Fast Inter Frame Coding in Video Conferencing Applications No-Reference Deep Quality Assessment of Compressed Light Field Images

item.title: Call for Papers
item.description: We are organizing a workshop at ICME 2021 (First International Workshop on Quality of Experience in Interactive Multimedia, https://2021.ieeeicme.org/conf_workshops). The submission deadline is March 13, 2021. Welcome to submit papers!

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: A paper authored by Zhanyuan Cai, Wei Gao, et.al. is accepted to IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems (ISCAS) 2021. View the detail: Efficient Fast Algorithm and Parallel Hardware Architecture for Intra Prediction of AVS3

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: A paper authored by Guibiao Liao, Wei Gao, et.al. is accepted to ACM Multimedia 2020 View the detail: MMNet: Multi-Stage and Multi-Scale Fusion Network for RGB-D Salient Object Detection

item.title: New Research Activity
item.description: Dr. Wei Gao has been appointed as Associate Editor for Electronics Letters (Internationally renowned peer-reviewed rapid-communication journal).

item.title: New Research Activity
item.description: Dr. Wei Gao has been appointed as Associate Editor for IET Image Processing (CCF recommended journal).

item.title: New Paper Acceptance
item.description: A paper authored by Wei Gao, Lvfang Tao, Linjie Zhou, Dinghao Yang, Xiaoyu Zhang and Zixuan Guo is accepted to CVPR 2020 Workshops. View the detail: Low-rate Image Compression with Super-Resolution Learning
